languages.text: Корабельные инструменты бессильны перед загадкой системы Раэт-Тави. Лицо сестры Ардженты излучает досаду и презрение. В этом объекте она видит нечестивую длань Архиврага, простертую в попытке сокрыть святое место от верных защитников Империума. По ее словам, в этом враги не преуспели, ведь слуги Императора уже здесь.

traits.locale_text: Корабельные инструменты бессильны перед загадкой системы Раэт-Тави. Лицо сестры Ардженты излучает досаду и презрение. В этом объекте она видит нечестивую длань Архиврага, простертую в попытке сокрыть святое место от верных защитников Империума. По ее словам, в этом враги не преуспели, ведь слуги Императора уже здесь.

languages.text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system. Sister Argenta's face twists with chagrin and contempt. She sees the accursed hand of the Archenemy at play, reaching out to conceal this holy place from the faithful defenders of the Imperium. By her words, "in this the enemy failed," for the servants of the Emperor are already here.
languages.original_text: Корабельные инструменты бессильны перед загадкой системы Раэт-Тави. Лицо сестры Ардженты излучает досаду и презрение. В этом объекте она видит нечестивую длань Архиврага, простертую в попытке сокрыть святое место от верных защитников Империума. По ее словам, в этом враги не преуспели, ведь слуги Императора уже здесь.

traits.locale_text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the mystery of the Raeth-Tawi system. Sister Argenta's face shows chagrin and contempt. In this object she sees the accursed hand of the Archenemy reaching out to conceal this holy place from the faithful defenders of the Imperium. According to her words, in this the enemy failed, for the servants of the Emperor are already here.

The ship's instruments are powerless before the mystery of the Raeth-Tawi system. Sister Argenta's face shows chagrin and contempt. In this object she sees the accursed hand of the Archenemy reaching out to conceal this holy place from the faithful defenders of the Imperium. According to her words, in this the enemy failed, for the servants of the Emperor are already here.

By her words, "in this the enemy failed," for the servants of the Emperor are already here.

The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system. Sister Argenta's face twists with chagrin and contempt. She sees the accursed hand of the Archenemy at play, reaching out to conceal this holy place from the faithful defenders of the Imperium. By her words, "in this the enemy failed," for the servants of the Emperor are already here.

languages.text: 早在瑞斯塔维星系的异常状况出现之前，飞船上的仪器就失效了。阿洁塔修女见状露出了懊恼而又轻蔑的神情。她认为这是混沌大敌的诅咒之手在作怪，试图遮住帝国忠实卫士的双眼，不让他们看到这个神圣之地。但用她的话来说，“敌人的阴谋破产了”，因为帝皇的仆人已经来到了这里。
languages.original_text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system. Sister Argenta's face twists with chagrin and contempt. She sees the accursed hand of the Archenemy at play, reaching out to conceal this holy place from the faithful defenders of the Imperium. By her words, "in this the enemy failed," for the servants of the Emperor are already here.

traits.locale_text: 早在瑞斯塔维星系的异常状况出现之前，飞船上的仪器就失效了。阿洁塔修女见状露出了懊恼而又轻蔑的神情。她认为这是混沌大敌的诅咒之手在作怪，试图遮住帝国忠实卫士的双眼，不让他们看到这个神圣之地。但用她的话来说，“敌人的阴谋破产了”，因为帝皇的仆人已经来到了这里。

languages.text: ラエス・タウィ星系の異常の前に、船の計器は無力だった。シスター・アルジェンタの顔が悔しさでゆがむ。彼女は、帝国の忠実な防衛者たちからこの神聖な場所を隠そうと手を伸ばす、宿敵の呪われた手が働いているのを目にする。皇帝の従者たちは既にここにいる。つまり彼女の言葉を借りれば、「敵は失敗した」のである。
languages.original_text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system. Sister Argenta's face twists with chagrin and contempt. She sees the accursed hand of the Archenemy at play, reaching out to conceal this holy place from the faithful defenders of the Imperium. By her words, "in this the enemy failed," for the servants of the Emperor are already here.

traits.locale_text: ラエス・タウィ星系の異常の前に、船の計器は無力だった。シスター・アルジェンタの顔が悔しさでゆがむ。彼女は、帝国の忠実な防衛者たちからこの神聖な場所を隠そうと手を伸ばす、宿敵の呪われた手が働いているのを目にする。皇帝の従者たちは既にここにいる。つまり彼女の言葉を借りれば、「敵は失敗した」のである。

languages.text: Los instrumentos de la nave son inútiles ante la aberración del sistema Raeth-Tawi. El rostro de la hermana Argenta se retuerce de disgusto y desprecio. Ve la mano maldita del Archienemigo en acción, tratando de ocultar este lugar sagrado a los fieles defensores del Imperium. Según sus palabras, «en esto fracasó el enemigo», pues los siervos del Emperador ya están aquí.
languages.original_text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system. Sister Argenta's face twists with chagrin and contempt. She sees the accursed hand of the Archenemy at play, reaching out to conceal this holy place from the faithful defenders of the Imperium. By her words, "in this the enemy failed," for the servants of the Emperor are already here.

traits.locale_text: Los instrumentos de la nave son inútiles ante la aberración del sistema Raeth-Tawi. El rostro de la hermana Argenta se retuerce de disgusto y desprecio. Ve la mano maldita del Archienemigo en acción, tratando de ocultar este lugar sagrado a los fieles defensores del Imperium. Según sus palabras, «en esto fracasó el enemigo», pues los siervos del Emperador ya están aquí.

languages.text: Die Instrumente des Schiffs sind machtlos gegen die Aberration des Raeth-Tawi-Systems. Schwester Argentas Gesicht verzieht sich vor Verdruss und Verachtung. Sie sieht die verfluchte Hand des Erzfeinds in Aktion, wie sie sich ausstreckt, um diesen heiligen Ort vor den gläubigen Verteidigern des Imperiums zu verstecken. Mit ihren Worten "ist der Feind darin gescheitert", denn die Diener des Imperators sind längst hier.
languages.original_text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system. Sister Argenta's face twists with chagrin and contempt. She sees the accursed hand of the Archenemy at play, reaching out to conceal this holy place from the faithful defenders of the Imperium. By her words, "in this the enemy failed," for the servants of the Emperor are already here.

traits.locale_text: Die Instrumente des Schiffs sind machtlos gegen die Aberration des Raeth-Tawi-Systems. Schwester Argentas Gesicht verzieht sich vor Verdruss und Verachtung. Sie sieht die verfluchte Hand des Erzfeinds in Aktion, wie sie sich ausstreckt, um diesen heiligen Ort vor den gläubigen Verteidigern des Imperiums zu verstecken. Mit ihren Worten "ist der Feind darin gescheitert", denn die Diener des Imperators sind längst hier.

languages.text: Les instruments du vaisseau sont impuissants face à l'aberration du système Raeth-Tawi. L'expression de sœur Argenta trahit un sentiment de dépit mâtiné de mépris. Elle voit dans ce phénomène la main maudite du Grand Ennemi, qui cherche à dissimuler ce lieu sacré aux yeux des fidèles défenseurs de l'Imperium. En vain, selon elle, car les serviteurs de l'Empereur sont déjà là.
languages.original_text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system. Sister Argenta's face twists with chagrin and contempt. She sees the accursed hand of the Archenemy at play, reaching out to conceal this holy place from the faithful defenders of the Imperium. By her words, "in this the enemy failed," for the servants of the Emperor are already here.

traits.locale_text: Les instruments du vaisseau sont impuissants face à l'aberration du système Raeth-Tawi. L'expression de sœur Argenta trahit un sentiment de dépit mâtiné de mépris. Elle voit dans ce phénomène la main maudite du Grand Ennemi, qui cherche à dissimuler ce lieu sacré aux yeux des fidèles défenseurs de l'Imperium. En vain, selon elle, car les serviteurs de l'Empereur sont déjà là.

languages.text: Geminin araçları, Raeth-Tawi sistemindeki sapkı karşısında güçsüz kalıyor. Rahibe Argenta'nın surat ifadesi, üzüntüsünü ve tiksintisini yansıtıyor. Bu kutsal yeri, İmparatorluk'un sadık savunucularından gizlemeye çalışan Şerbaşı'nın lanetli elini görüyor. Ona göre bu çaba, İmparator'un hizmetkârlarının hâlihazırda orada oluşu sebebiyle "boşuna".
languages.original_text: The ship's instruments are powerless before the aberration of the Raeth-Tawi system. Sister Argenta's face twists with chagrin and contempt. She sees the accursed hand of the Archenemy at play, reaching out to conceal this holy place from the faithful defenders of the Imperium. By her words, "in this the enemy failed," for the servants of the Emperor are already here.
